R0004.question: Is the GU with normal limit?
R0004.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-1.question: Is the GU incontinent?
R0004-1.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-2.question: Is the GU with bladder distention?
R0004-2.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-3.question: Is the GU with burning?
R0004-3.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-4.question: Is the GU with frequency?
R0004-4.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-5.question: Is the GU with dysuria?
R0004-5.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-6.question: Is the GU with retention?
R0004-6.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-7.question: Is the GU with normal urgency?
R0004-7.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-8.question: Is the GU with normal urostomy?
R0004-8.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-9.question: Is the Urine checked?
R0004-9.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-10.question: Is the urine cloudy?
R0004-10.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-11.question: Is the urine odorous?
R0004-11.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-12.question: Is the urine sediment?
R0004-12.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-13.question: Is the urine hematuria?
R0004-13.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-14.question: Is the external genitalia checked?
R0004-14.instructions: If Yes then true, otherwise false

R0004-15.question: Is the external genitalia normal?
R0004-15.instructions: If Yes then normal, otherwise abnormal

R0004-16.question: Is the external genitalia checked as per clinical assessment?
R0004-16.instructions: If yes then clinical assessment, otherwise as per PI/CG Report

M1600.question: Have you treated for urinary tract infection in the past 14 days?
M1600.instructions: if no then value 0, yes then value 1, not applicable then value NA, No idea then UK

M1610.question: Is urinary incontinence or urinary cathedral present?
M1610.instructions: if no then value 0, yes then value 2, no idea then value 1

M1620.question: Have you bowel incontinence frequency?
M1620.instructions: if yes, then value 0 for very rarely or never has bowel incontinence, value 1 for less than once weekly, value 2 for One to three times weekly, value 3 for four to six times weekly, value 4 for on a daily basis, value 5 for more often than once daily, value 6 for NA- Patient has ostomy for bowel elimination, value 7 for UK - unknown

M1630.question: Have you does an ostomy for bowel elimination?
M1630.instructions: if yes, then value 0 for Patient does not have an ostomy for bowel elimination, value 1 for Patient's ostomy was not related to an inpatient stay and did not necessitate change in medical or treatment regimen, value 2 for the ostomy was related to an inpatient stay or did necessitate change in medical or treatment regimen

R0001.question: Whether you are having any dialysis?
R0001.instructions: if patient has, select true as the value otherwise false

R0002.question: Do you have  type of intervention
R0002.instructions: If patient is, select true as the value otherwise false

R0003.question: Have you setup any goal?
R0003.instructions: If patient have, select true as the value otherwise false
